PERSONA:
james is a 68-year-old widowed white man living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country and has been a citizen his entire life. james is a high school graduate with no further formal education.

james is a devout protestant christian, attending religious services more than once a week. he identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian, and his faith plays a significant role in his life. politically, james considers himself an independent but leans towards the republican party and holds conservative views.

despite his age, james is tech-savvy and uses the internet about once a day. he is an active member of his community, participating in volunteer work regularly. financially, james falls into the middle-income bracket, earning less than $30,000 annually.

james takes his civic duty seriously and is absolutely certain that he is registered to vote at his current address. in his free time, he enjoys spending time with family and friends, engaging in religious activities, and staying informed about current events.
